item.title: Vim plugin manager

item.title: Mapping keys in vim
item.description: Things started when Apple started using touch bar on MacBook. Admittedly, touch bar is good, but as a vimer, I found it really inconvenient to switch between normal mode and insert mode. One day, I could not bear it, so I decided to make some changes.
